channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: 🟠 Satellite image of the #BootlegFire, #Oregon, #USA 18 July 2021 - 3D Infrared view with exaggerated elevation #Copernicus🇪🇺 #Sentinel-2🛰️ Full-size ➡️ https://t.co/PM8NMSwj1R #RemoteSensing #OpenData #scicomm #Wildfire https://t.co/3wtIMqfKP2
１日あたりの陽性者対比で重傷者率と死亡者率の推移を2020年3月からみると、今は昨年のGotoトラベルやイートやってた夏の時期とほぼ変わらない。陽性者の数ではなくこういう指標の方が重要ではないの？ https://t.co/12ddjBILKY https://t.co/O1oPVXG4By

🟠 Fires🔥 and smoke plumes northwest of #Kamloops, #BritishColumbia, #Canada🇨🇦 19 July 2021 #Copernicus🇪🇺 #Sentinel-2🛰️ Full-size ➡️ https://t.co/UnRG7H3Rqw #RemoteSensing #OpenData #scicomm Image is about 117 kilometers wide https://t.co/kAR33iDbYL

🌊 @OceanDAO_ Funding Round 8 is live! $275K USD available for #DataScience, #AI & #Developer community projects that grow the Open Data Economy.
• Max Funding per Project: $17.6K USD • Proposals due by Aug 3 @ 23:59 GMT
Full details on our blog. https://t.co/GUN2VQzrn6 https://t.co/N9JxrP4eHt
Govt said no deaths due to lack of oxygen in second wave. Meanwhile, our story of oxygen deaths recorded by an open data tracker https://t.co/hAu2qIq9dp https://t.co/QTesQH7ftI

Stamani ispirato da @ondatait ho preparato uno scraper di dati ISS/INFN.
Obv sono aggregati con media mobile 7d, ma non credo di aver trovato dataset più granulari (oltre a CEEDS-DEMM che non ha Lombardia). Enjoy ✌️
https://t.co/XupGykGb28
#opendata #COVID19

Statt „exklusiver Daten“ für eine staatliche App, hätte man sie besser mal als OpenData zur Verfügung gestellt, damit jeder Anbieter auf sie zugreifen kann. DAS wäre ein serviceorientierter Staat. Aber nein, lieber wieder Mio€ für eine #AutobahnApp raushauen, die keiner nutzt 🤦🏼‍♂️ https://t.co/hSVGjhBoQz

Today the #EU flags are at half-mast. We pay tribute to the victims of the recent floods in Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands, and Luxembourg. Our gratitude goes out to the services and volunteers who continue to help. 🇧🇪🇩🇪🇳🇱🇱🇺🇪🇺 https://t.co/8EfLNF1SiA

Pretty chuffed to add a new advisory role to my work: member of the advisory research committee for the global data barometer (formerly the open data barometer).
I'm in some extraordinary company. 🙏

@algida74 @CarloCalenda Fai polemica senza capire le risposte che ti vengono date o le capisci e comunque fai polemica per li solo gusto di farlo. E' tempo improduttivo discutere con chi non vuole capire ed ha forti pregiudizi. Ci sono comunque dati pubblici da consultare se uno ne ha voglia.
Audition ce matin… en lien avec l’#opendata https://t.co/viaSjqRYPk

@rebeccatmoore @ESA_EO @CopernicusEU Thank you, Rebecca! A free, full and open data policy is one of the reasons why the Copernicus programme has been so successful worldwide. Always happy to see the data being used for the benefit of society.

Anyone who has spent 5 years of their life designing, organizing, leading, and analyzing a major clinical trial is understandably very protective of the data. Not surprisingly, almost everyone who argues unconditionally for open data has no skin in the game.

Vorschlag: Die NiNa/MoWaS-Warnmeldungen werden per API auch an soziale Netzwerke bereitgestellt und dort ab gewissen Warnstufen in Streams angezeigt. Klarer Fall von Open Data, den man ein bisschen weiterdenken muss. Verfälschen strafbar usw.

Wer Open Data, Datennutzungsgesetz und den Data Governance Act verstehen und zusammenbringen will, kann sich hier aus den fachlich zuständigen Federn der kundigen Köpfe unseres Arbeitsstabes im @BMWi_Bund informieren. 👇 https://t.co/5EihCCQTJG

Mit der großartigen Kollegin Anna Ludin aus dem @BMWi_Bund habe ich in der @MMRZeitschrift einen Überblicksbeitrag über aktuelle datenrechtspolitische Initiativen veröffentlicht. Von dem 2. #OpenData Gesetz und dem #Datennutzungsgesetz #DNG bis zum Data Governance Act #DGA. https://t.co/LiHPhNzj4D

An integrated national data system (INDS) is not just an aspirational model. It is something that every country can work toward today. Here's what we learned from 🇪🇪Estonia, 🇬🇭Ghana, and 🇲🇽Mexico: https://t.co/KC5y7HYdam

I used this tweet as inspiration to build a shiny where users browse a set of debt contracts on a DT and select a single row. This selection feeds another DT with some related documents. Now it's easy to choose a single document to see its pdf. #RStats #EconTwitter #OpenData https://t.co/WYqxa3SMLB https://t.co/WSIaFflaIo
